title: Mama Tot: S & M & How She Met Her Husband
itunes:title: Mama Tot: S & M & How She Met Her Husband
description:
In Part 2, Mama Tot aka Ophelia Nichols opens up about being emancipated at 17, what she has learned from her marriages, and creating the family she has always dreamed of. Things also get fiery when she talks to Bunnie about passion parties, her love of S&M, and how she became an accidental TikTok phenomenon. 

Mama Tot: Podcast | TikTok

Mama Tot IG  

Bunnie: Website
